title: GebetaLink – SaaS Restaurant Management Platform
description: Founder & Lead Developer | Architected and built a full-stack SaaS platform for restaurants in Ethiopia. The platform includes real-time order dashboards (Socket.IO), Chapa payment integration, and a multi-role admin system for restaurant owners, chefs, and super admins.

title: Hope Behind Bars – Non-Profit Website with CMS
description: Lead Full-Stack Developer | Developed an impactful website for a non-profit organization, focusing on storytelling and driving donations. Delivered a custom admin dashboard enabling the client to publish blogs, videos, and publications easily, all built with Next.js and CMS integration.

title: Kalkidan Birhanu – Creative Video Editor Portfolio
description: Lead Frontend Developer | Built a high-performance React portfolio for a creative professional to showcase video and design work. Designed a fast, SEO-optimized, and engaging experience using React, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.

title: GO2COD Internship & Training Platform
description: COO & Co-Founder | Led the creation of a web app for managing internships, mentorships, and developer training. The platform provides seamless intern onboarding and management for hundreds of students across Africa.
